pageContext.claim: “We fired so many of these wise guys. We had one getting $350,000 a year teaching our military this stuff and he said, 'What happened?' We said, 'You're fired. Get out. You're done.' Many people. No, it's become -- it's become a cancer. It's like a cancer. Many, many people gone.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump ordered the federal government to stop teaching "critical race theory" on the grounds that it is anti-American. But we cannot find evidence of the military instructor earning $350,000 a year who was fired because of his directive.
